about_the_game:
Experience the demo chapter of Pastopia, a third person, open-world adventure where coding unlocks the secrets of a forgotten world.

What will you expect in this demo?

  • Playtime ranges around 10 - 30 minutes of gameplay.

  • Explore a small section of Talmanu, from the ancient ruins of the Spire to the lush landscapes of Thala Henge.

  • Solve a variety of puzzles throughout Pastopia using MiniScript.

  • Use block-based coding and scripting to spawn objects, build structures, and craft unique solutions your way.

  • Experiment with your A.I. companion, Golem, who will help debug code, offer guidance, and spark creativity along your journey.

This demo introduces the core mechanics of Pastopia, including coding, exploration, and creative problem-solving, giving you a taste of the adventure that's yet to come.

Check out the Pastopia page to learn more about the full game and its expansive features, which includes a new coding language, exploration area and the introduction of a new, whimsy NPC!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Integrated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Apple M1 Integrated Sound Card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 OS
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.0Ghz (Gen11 or later)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD graphics (Gen11 or later)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Not available

short_description: Become a Memory Walker in Pastopia and restore the mystical lands of Talmanu. In this open-world adventure, team up with your Golem A.I companion to explore vast environments, solve puzzles, and unleash your creativity. Discover the lost memories of Pastopia and shape your own adventure!
